descriptionHtml:
*update *Arrived* made a lessor power version the draw/bash spell triggers in console help Heck or Hecks will do the lesser power version is a toggle spell you activate the toggle everytime your draw anyweapon you slow time for 2 seconnds everytime you bash you send out an explosive wind slash.

the lessor power is an optional file



type help uchi in console
3 katanas using similar scripts

Path of the void uchigatana- very powerful drawblade technique that tears through time and space damaging enemies in 15ft radious and slowing time for 10 sec (too strong youthink change duration in ck its easy lesser power draw time )

this sword secondary effect is every time you bash you send out powerful fireball (and unused spell from the original game firestormblast)


The Simple Path uchigatana
Ablade emphasising utility rarther than brute force, upon drawing the blade summons a ice whirlwind and slows time, its Bash spell is the lightning rune

FireCLoudUchigatanta
A powerful daedric spell that flings whirdwind of ice upon drawing and upon bashing sends out fire balls

Current models are in use free to use weapons of 3rd ear silver katana and deadric 2 awesome weapons check it out here
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/?


future upates-cleaning up the enchantment currently .5 has no enchantments as the chain lightning enchantment wasnt working as intended.
if anyone can take a video it would be most apprietated thanks. my pc slow
*releasing this purely for people who couldnt find help regarding weapons similar to dawnguard rune hammer but did not want a hammer or a rune spell, yeah i was one of those people*

*notes* at the moment this is extremely basic, as i didnt want to over complicated my goal which was to release an alternative to the rune hammer. future updates will contain idles for spells used and perhaps custom nif files.
author: hecks567
